name: Ronin Runner
description:
Gameplay

You are a Ronin in an endless runner and the goal of the game is to not get hit by any of the enemies in your path. The mushroom enemies and flying enemies can be destroyed with attack, spiked walls cannot be destroyed and must be jumped over. The enemies will gradually get faster over time. The score will continuously increased as long as the player is alive and bonus points are added to score for every monster killed.

Controls

Jump - w key or up arrow

Attack - spacebar or left click

Jump Attack - Attack while in the air

Credits

Made By Saku(Jalen Carney)

Sound Effects - leohpaz

Soundtrack - ALIEN NUDE LTD

Assets - ALIEN NUDE LTD, NYKNCK, Luiz Melo, Szadi Art.
